name: PrintVis
description:
PrintVis A / S develops Microsoft Dynamics NAV based solutions for the printing industry. Our goal is to create the ultimate IT solution for all types of graphics companies - to improve efficiency and strengthen competitiveness. We offer a sophisticated, innovative and extremely comprehensive end-to-end management system. The product is called PrintVis.

Our system is based on Microsoft Dynamics NAV and handles all phases of prepress, printing and finishing to distribution. PrintVis are modular and can be flexibly adapted to your particular graphics business, so you get the most optimal solution. With the system you have, among other things overview of quotations, orders, customer and vendor balances, work in progress, front and costing, capacity, time and cost of sales, complaints, warehousing and logistics. You can thus keep track of the entire production process from start to finish - before, during and after printing. We help you all the way.
